attributes.action: Take ASBO away from Councils put back in the hands of the police
attributes.additional_details:
Stand up and be counted we say no to ASBO

On Wednesday 12th September 2012 in the Newham Recorder Headline
Number of crime reported to borough police soars in July.

Insert :
Newham has the highest crime level in East London in July , latest police figures show 2,855 incidents were reported during the month .July was busier for officers figures show of 2,787and 2,681 respectively more than 1,500 complaints of antisocial behaviour made up the bulk of July's incidents.

I have been suffering with ASB behaviour for the last 4 years and my council Newham London have just been going round in circles and not resloving this the police were more helpful with this that is why i am putting this petition up.

one simple message

LET THE POLICE DEAL WITH ASBO THEY HAVE MORE POWERS COUNCIL HAVE FAILED IN THIS AREA AND ALL THE COUNCILS DO IS TAKE GOVERMENT MONEY AND LET PEOPLE SUFFER FROM THE EFFECTS OF ASBO BY TAKING THEIR LIVES.
